```{r sparrow data}
sparrow_el <- sparrow %>% 
    select(-c(1:3)) %>%
    cmbDFrame()

sparrow_g <- sparrow_el$mrgCCombs %>% 
    data.frame() %>%
    mutate(X1 = as.character(X1), X2 = as.character(X2))
```

```{r}
sparrow_g$index <- 0

for(i in 1:nrow(unique(sparrow_g))) {
    RowsOcurrency <- rowSums(t(apply(sparrow_g, 1, function(x) x %in%  unique(sparrow_g)[i, ]))) == 2
    
    A <- sum(RowsOcurrency)


    if(unique(sparrow_g)[i, 2] == "") {
        B <- sum(sparrow_g == unique(sparrow_g)[i, 1])
        } else {
         B <- sum(sparrow_g == unique(sparrow_g)[i, 1],
             sparrow_g == unique(sparrow_g)[i, 2])   
        }

    ##we apply the operation A/(B-A) given that by calculating the sum of the frecuency of A and B we are adding twice the value of the interaction A*B.
    sparrow_g$index[RowsOcurrency] <- A/(B-A)

print(i)
}

```
